title: Fix とも particle splitting
description:
## Issue

Himotoki incorrectly splits the particle とも into と+も.

## Example

**Sentence**: たとえ世界中が反対しようとも私は私の信念を貫き通すつもりだ

### Segmentation Comparison

| Ichiran | Himotoki |
|---------|----------|
| たとえ | たとえ |
| 世界中 | 世界中 |
| が | が |
| 反対しよう | 反対しよう |
| **とも** | **と** |
| 私 | **も** |
| は | 私 |
| ... | は ... |

## Expected Behavior

とも should be kept together as a single particle meaning 'even if' when following volitional form.

## Reference

See ichiran-source-code for how this pattern is handled.

title: LLM eval #262: ですが wrongly merged + missing POS
description: Entry #262 (score 60): ですが treated as single conjunction instead of です+が. Missing POS for verbs. ん as interjection.

title: LLM eval #254: でない misanalyzed as 居る

title: Mismatch #37: Ichiran better for なんて split in 提出させられるなんて
Fix につけ grammatical expression splitting
description:
## Issue

Himotoki incorrectly splits the grammatical expression につけ (whenever) into separate components.

## Example

**Sentence**: 彼女の笑顔を見るにつけ私の心は癒されるのだ

| System | Segmentation |
|--------|--------------|
| **Ichiran** | 彼女 / の / 笑顔 / を / 見る / **につけ** / 私 / の / 心 / は / 癒される / の / だ |
| **Himotoki** | 彼女 / の / 笑顔 / を / 見る / **に** / **つけ** / 私 / の / 心 / は / 癒される / の / だ |

## Expected Behavior

につけ should be kept together as a grammatical expression meaning 'whenever' or 'every time'.

## Reference

See ichiran-source-code for how Ichiran handles this pattern.

## Related Patterns

Other expressions that may need similar handling:
- にしたがって (in accordance with)
- にともなって (along with)
- につれて (as/in proportion to)

title: LLM eval #23: kimi instead of kun
description:
## Problem

The kanji 君 reading くん (suffix) instead of きみ (pronoun).

## Sentence
未来なんて誰にも分からないけど君となら歩いていける気がする

## Issue
In 君となら (if with you), 君 is a pronoun, not a suffix.
Current: くん [suf] Expected: きみ [pn]

## Fix
Context-aware disambiguation in lookup.py synergies.py

title: LLM eval #204: 仕掛けたんだ segmentation/POS
description: Entry #204 (score 45): Incorrect segmentation and POS tagging of 仕掛けたんだ.

title: Contracted verb form readings have extra syllables
description:
## Problem

Contracted verb forms have incorrect readings with extra syllables.

## Examples

#28: 生きていか reading いきていかせ (extra せ)
#30: 言えず reading いえないず (should be いえず)
#32: 引退しちゃう reading いんたいしてちゃう (extra て)
#32: 応援しなきゃ reading おうえんしなければなきゃ (expanded)
#37: 選ばれちゃって reading えらばれてちゃって (extra て)

## Pattern

~ちゃう/~ちゃって forms: reading includes uncontracted て
~なきゃ forms: reading expands to ~なければ+なきゃ
~ず forms: reading adds ない before ず

## Root Cause

Reading generation for contracted forms is expanding or corrupting the reading instead of generating the contracted form directly.

## Affected entries

#28, #30, #32, #37

title: Fix 未だに adverb splitting
description:
## Issue

Himotoki incorrectly splits the adverb 未だに (still/yet) into 未だ+に.

## Example

**Sentence**: 日本語を勉強し始めて3年になるが敬語の使い分けは未だに難しいと感じる

### Segmentation Comparison

| Ichiran | Himotoki |
|---------|----------|
| 使い分け | 使い分け |
| は | は |
| **未だに** | **未だ** |
| 難しい | **に** |
| と | 難しい |
| 感じる | と ... |

## Expected Behavior

未だに should be kept together as a single adverb meaning 'still' or 'even now'.

## Reference

See ichiran-source-code for how this pattern is handled.

title: LLM eval #246: 逃しちゃった extra て in reading
description: Entry #246 (score 60): Reading for 逃しちゃった is のがしてちゃった with extra て. Also で as copula (known) and missing POS.

title: LLM eval #26: zen vs mae reading for 前
description: Problem: 前 read as ぜん instead of まえ. Sentence: 君の温もりが消えてしまう前にもう一度だけ抱きしめさせてくれ. Also 温もり treated as verb conjugation instead of noun. In 前に pattern, reading should be まえ. Fix: context-aware disambiguation in lookup.py

title: LLM eval #23: kun vs kimi reading
description: PARTIAL FIX: Simple cases like '君と' now correctly show きみ. Full sentence context still has issues due to beam search path selection. See commit 3ffc392.

title: LLM eval #267: 羽田 split into 羽+田 (proper noun)
description: Entry #267 (score 72): Proper noun 羽田 (Haneda) split into 羽(counter)+田. Same class of bug as #223 田中. 羽 read as わ instead of は.

title: CRITICAL: 億円 reading completely wrong (まんまんえん)
description:
## Problem

The counter expression 億円 (100 million yen) has completely wrong reading まんまんえん instead of おくえん.

## Sentence
eスポーツの国際大会で日本チームが優勝し賞金1億円を獲得しました

## Current Reading
1億円 → まんまんえん (nonsensical)

## Expected Reading
1億円 → いちおくえん

## Impact
This is a serious bug affecting number/counter reading generation. Users would see completely wrong readings for monetary amounts.

## Affected entries
#139

## Likely location
himotoki/counters.py or reading generation for number expressions.

title: Mismatch #23: Ichiran better for した/だ split in ねーしただ

description: Entry #308 (score 50): 変わらぬ reading is かわらないぬ, wrong. Components listed as [変わらない, ぬ] which is nonsensical. ぬ negative suffix not recognized. Missing POS.

title: Fix かーい elongation splitting
description:
## Issue

Himotoki incorrectly splits elongated particles like かーい into か+ーい.

## Example

**Sentence**: バイトのシフト急に入れられて草断る権利ないんかーい

### Segmentation Comparison

| Ichiran | Himotoki |
|---------|----------|
| ない | ない |
| ん | ん |
| **かーい** | **か** |
| (end) | **ーい** |

## Expected Behavior

Elongated particles/expressions should be kept together. The ー (prolonged sound mark) should not be split from the base character.

## Related Patterns

- ねー (ね + elongation)
- じゃー (じゃ + elongation)  
- よー (よ + elongation)

## Reference

See ichiran-source-code for how elongation is handled.

title: LLM eval #13: Particle よ misidentified as Adjective Stem
description:
## Problem

The sentence-ending particle **よ** (seq: 2029090) is incorrectly identified as the Adjective Stem conjugation of the adjective **いい**.

## Sentence
`見せてやるよ地獄の底から這い上がってきた俺の執念を`

## Current Output
```
{
  "text": "よ",
  "kana": "よ",
  "seq": 2029090,
  "conj_type": "Adjective Stem",
  "source_text": "いい",
  "pos": []
}
```

## Expected Output
```
{
  "text": "よ",
  "kana": "よ",
  "seq": 2029090,
  "conj_type": null,
  "source_text": null,
  "pos": ["[prt]"]
}
```

## Root Cause Analysis

The conjugation rule in `loading/conjugations.py` line ~1764 adds:
```python
# Adjective stem: いい -> よ (uses euphonic change) 
ConjugationRule(
    pos=adj_ix_id, conj=CONJ_ADJECTIVE_STEM, neg=False, fml=False,
    onum=1, stem=1, okuri='', euphr='よ', euphk=''
)
```

When standalone **よ** ap  --description ##

title: LLM eval #234: ないよう wrongly matched to 内容
description: Entry #234 (score 72): NEW BUG — ないよう (negative purposive) incorrectly matched to noun 内容(ないよう). Should be ない + よう.

title: Fix たん past+explanatory boundary
description:
## Issue

Himotoki incorrectly splits past tense + explanatory ん at the wrong boundary.

## Example

**Sentence**: 私は無実だ誰かが私を陥れようとして罠を仕掛けたんだ

### Segmentation Comparison

| Ichiran (Correct) | Himotoki (Incorrect) |
|-------------------|----------------------|
| 仕掛け**た** / **ん** / だ | 仕掛け / **たん** / だ |

## Analysis

- **Ichiran**: 仕掛けた (set up - past tense) + ん (explanatory particle) + だ (copula)
- **Himotoki**: 仕掛け (stem) + たん (incorrectly grouped past+explanatory) + だ

## Expected Behavior

The past tense た should attach to the verb stem, and ん should be separate:
- 仕掛けた (past tense verb)
- ん (explanatory)
- だ (copula)

## Reference

See ichiran-source-code for how this pattern is handled.

title: LLM eval #42: contracted reading (じゃん/読んでない)
description: Entry #42: 読んでない reading よんでいない, じゃん reading ではないん. Related to himotoki-9o7 (contracted forms). Verify if fix resolves this.
close_reason: Contracted reading fixed; remaining issues are POS metadata

title: LLM eval #21: Wrong reading for 言わないで
description:
## Problem

The token **言わないで** has incorrect reading **いわなくて** instead of **いわないで**.

Additionally, the trailing で particle in どこかで is misidentified as the conjunctive form of copula だ.

## Sentence
`さよならなんて言わないできっとまたどこかで巡り会えるはずだから`

## Current Issue
- 言わないで reading: いわなくて (wrong)
- Expected reading: いわないで

## Root Cause Analysis
The ~ないで form is being confused with ~なくて form. Both are negative te-forms but have different readings:
- ~ないで (prohibition/request): direct te-form of negative
- ~なくて (causal/connective): te-form via く-adverb

This is a reading generation bug in conjugation handling.

## How to Verify
```bash
python scripts/check_segments.py 21
python scripts/llm_eval.py --rescore 21
```
close_reason: Fixed with suffix matching in get_matching_kana_for_kanji

title: Mismatch #5: Ichiran better for なんて split in 発動させるなんて
LLM eval #210: 人 still read as じん in 人の一生
description: Entry #210 (score 45): 人 still read as じん (suffix) in 人の一生 context. Previous fix (commit 19d8456) did not resolve this. Also has empty POS for verbs and missing passive for 選ばれた.

title: となら merged instead of split into と+なら
description:
## Problem

Himotoki merges となら into a single token, while Ichiran correctly splits it into と (particle) + なら (conditional).

## Sentence
未来なんて誰にも分からないけど君となら歩いていける気がする

## Ichiran
未来 / なんて / 誰にも / 分からない / けど / 君 / と / なら / 歩いていける / 気がする

## Himotoki
未来 / なんて / 誰にも / 分からない / けど / 君 / となら / 歩いていける / 気がする

## Expected
と and なら should be separate tokens.

## How to Verify
python scripts/check_segments.py 23

title: LLM eval #250: よ as adj stem + で as copula
description: Entry #250 (score 45): よ misidentified as adj stem (known). で in カフェで identified as copula (known). Missing POS for 立てたい, 打ち合わせしよう.

title: Fix なんて expression splitting
description:
## Issue

Himotoki incorrectly splits the expression なんて (such things as / things like) into separate morphemes.

## Example

**Sentence**: 明日までにレポートを提出させられるなんてもっと早く言ってくれればよかったのに

### Ichiran (Correct)
```
明日         → あした         [n,adv]
まで         → まで          [prt]
に          → に           [prt]
レポート       → レポート        [n,vs,vt]
を          → を           [prt]
提出させられる    → ていしゅつさせられる  [Potential] ← させる
なんて        → なんて         [adj-f,adv]  ✓ CORRECT: kept as expression
もっと        → もっと         [adv]
早く         → はやく         [adv]
言ってくれれば    → いってくれれば     [Provisional] ← 呉れる
よかった       → よかった        [Past] ← いい
のに         → のに          [prt]
```

### Himotoki (Incorrect)
```
明日         → あした         [n,adv]
まで         → まで          [prt]
に          → に           [prt]
レポート       → レポート        [n,vs,vt]
を          → を           [prt]
提出させられるな   → ていしゅつ させられるな  [Imperative] ← させる  ✗ WRONG conjugation
ん          → ん           [int]  ✗ SPLIT
て          → て           [prt]  ✗ SPLIT
もっと        → もっと         [adv]
早く         → はやく         [adv]
言ってくれれば    → いってくれれば     [Provisional] ← 呉れる
よかった       → よかった        [Past] ← いい
のに         → のに          [prt]
```

## Root Cause

Himotoki is incorrectly analyzing:
- 提出させられる + なんて as 提出させられるな + ん + て
- This changes the meaning from 'being made to submit things like...' to 'Don't make me submit!'

## Expected Behavior

なんて should be recognized as a single expression meaning 'such things as' or 'things like'.

title: よその segmentation bug
description: Entry #197: ですよその incorrectly segmented as です+よそ+の instead of です+よ+その. The particle よ is being merged with その to create よそ (elsewhere).

title: で particle misidentified as copula conjunctive
description:
## Problem

Case particle で (location/means) is being incorrectly identified as the conjunctive (~te) form of copula だ.

## Examples

コンビニで - location (at convenience store), not copula
カラオケで - location (at karaoke), not copula  
電車で - means (by train), not copula

## Affected entries

#52, #53, #58 (and likely many more)

## Root Cause

The parser is matching で to the copula だ conjugation pattern instead of recognizing it as a standalone case particle.

## Fix

Improve disambiguation in lookup.py - when で follows a noun, prefer case particle interpretation.
